content.question: Which of the following histograms has a shape that is approximately uniform?

choices.label: The figure presents a histogram. The horizontal axis has no labels or values indicated. The vertical axis is labeled Relative Frequency, and the numbers 0.00 through 0.14, in increments of 0.02, are indicated. There are 9 bars of equal width. The data of the bars are as follows. Note that all values are approximate. Bar 1, 0.10. Bar 2, 0.11. Bar 3, 0.12. Bar 4, 0.12. Bar 5, 0.11. Bar 6, 0.10. Bar 7, 0.12. Bar 8, 0.11. Bar 9, 0.11.
